text:
Khloé Kardashian isn’t going to let pregnancy stop her from getting intimate with Tristan Thompson! Though the 33-year-old reality star is almost nine months pregnant and ready to pop, she’s still feeling a little frisky in the bedroom department. Case in point: Her scantily-clad maternity shoot with her baby daddy.

In a new photo, the mom-to-be strips down to her underwear for a fun romp in bed with her 27-year-old beau. This is definitely a side of Khloé we’ve never seen before!

Parents-to-Be Who says you can’t feel sexy when you’re pregnant? Clearly, Khloé Kardashian is doing both. Though her due date is just around the corner, the Keeping Up with the Kardashians star and her boyfriend, Tristan Thompson, are still heating things up in the bedroom. As seen in her latest maternity shoot, the couple — who is expecting their first child together — couldn’t keep their hands off each other as they pose for photos.

Advertisement Intimate Moments In one intimate shot shared on Khloé’s app, the 33-year-old can be seen showing off her massive baby bump in lacy lingerie and a see-through kimono. Sitting on an unmade bed, the Revenge Body host caresses a shirtless Tristan’s arm as the 27-year-old Cleveland Cavaliers player touches her thigh. According to Khloé, she commissioned the scantily-clad shoot because she wanted to commemorate “the beautiful process that is pregnancy.” “Being pregnant has always been a dream of mine. Even though 9 months feels like a lifetime while I’m awaiting the arrival of my baby girl, it’s really a blink in the grand scheme of life,” she wrote. “I know I’m going to miss my belly so much once she’s here, I had to capture the beautiful process that is pregnancy so I can always look back at this time.”
title: Hot Mama! Pregnant Khloé Kardashian Strips Down and Gets in Bed with Tristan Thompson
